docs.snippet: Motion pictures create a second life for paperbacks. People suddenly become aware of the title--"If they made a movie, it must have been a book." They see the film and don't understand it; or they do understand it and hope it will help them figure...
docs.lead_paragraph: Motion pictures create a second life for paperbacks. People suddenly become aware of the title--"If they made a movie, it must have been a book." They see the film and don't understand it; or they do understand it and hope it will help them figure out the book. They might buy the reprint to discover what the movie left out; or, if they haven't seen it,
